name: Tsareena
author: Naoki Saito
flavor_text: Its long, striking legs aren’t just for show but to be used to kick with skill. In victory, it shows off by kicking the defeated, laughing boisterously.

abilities.name: Queenly Majesty
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may have your opponent reveal their hand. Then, discard a card from it.

attacks.name: Trop Kick
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage and remove all Special Conditions from this Pokémon.
